Package edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast

Class Instruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.AST
      • edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.Instruction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InstructionNoArgs, InstructionOneArg
    public abstract class Instruction
extends AST
    This abstract class implements common methods for the abstract syntax tree of a single assembly language instruction.

        public java.util.List<Token> getLabels()

      • getArg

        public Token getArg()

      • setAddress

        public void setAddress​(int address)
                throws ConstraintException
        Sets the memory address for an instruction. Also defines the label values if the instruction has labels.
        Throws:
        ConstraintException

      • getAddress

        public int getAddress()
        Returns the address of this instruction.

      • defineIdAddress

        public void defineIdAddress​(Token identifier,
                            int size)
                     throws ConstraintException
        map the text of the identifier token to an address on the stack
        Throws:
        ConstraintException

      • getIdAddress

        protected int getIdAddress​(Token identifier)
        Returns the stack address associated with an identifier.

      • getArgSize

        protected abstract int getArgSize()
        Returns the number of bytes in memory occupied by the argument.

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns the number of bytes in memory occupied by the instruction, computed as 1 (for the opcode) plus the sizes of the operands.

      • checkLabels

        protected void checkLabels()
                    throws ConstraintException
        If this instruction has labels, this method checks that each label has a value defined in the label map. This method should not be called for an instruction before method setAddress().
        Throws:
        ConstraintException - if the instruction has a label that is not defined in the label map.

      • checkLabelArgDefined

        protected void checkLabelArgDefined()
                             throws ConstraintException
        This method is called by instructions that have an argument that references a label. It verifies that the referenced label exists.
        Throws:
        ConstraintException

      • checkIdArgDefined

        protected void checkIdArgDefined()
                          throws ConstraintException
        This method is called by instructions that have an argument that references an identifier. It verifies that the referenced identifier exists.
        Throws:
        ConstraintException

      • checkArgType

        protected void checkArgType​(Symbol argType)
                     throws ConstraintException
        This method is called by instructions to verify the type of its argument.
        Throws:
        ConstraintException

      • getDisplacement

        protected int getDisplacement​(Token labelArg)
        Calculates the displacement between an instruction's address and a label (computed as label's address - instruction's address). This method is used by branching and call instructions.

      • argToInt

        public int argToInt()
        Returns the argument as converted to an integer. Valid only for instructions with arguments of type intLiteral.

      • argToByte

        public byte argToByte()
        Returns the argument as converted to a byte. Valid only for instructions with arguments of type intLigeral.

      • assertOpCode

        protected abstract void assertOpCode()
        Asserts that the opCode token of the instruction has the correct Symbol. Implemented in each instruction by calling the method assertOpCode(Symbol).

      • assertOpCode

        protected void assertOpCode​(Symbol opCode)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
